abstract: The group will pay about $250 million for an 11 percent stake in N.B.A. China.
snippet: The group will pay about $250 million for an 11 percent stake in N.B.A. China.
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Company and four Chinese investment firms will invest in an 11 percent stake in the National Basketball Association’s subsidiary in China, people briefed on the matter said Sunday.

headline.main: Disney Among Firms to Buy Stake in N.B.A.’s China Subsidiary
headline.print_headline: Disney and 4 Chinese Investment Firms to Buy Stake in N.B.A.’s China Subsidiary

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced

abstract: The Walt Disney Company and four Chinese investment firms will invest in an 11 percent stake in the National Basketball Association’s subsidiary in China, according to The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Company and four Chinese investment firms will invest in an 11 percent stake in the National Basketball Association’s subsidiary in China, according to The New York Times.

headline.main: Disney, Chinese Investors to Buy Stake in N.B.A. China
